general.byline: Software Engineer in Berlin, Germany, He / Him
general.about: I build and design digital products and experiences, focusing on Web3.

projects.heading: Rollup.wtf at Conduit
projects.description: Development of Rollup.wtf L2 / L3 tracker with [@emilianobonassi](https://x.com/emilianobonassi), [@bertiecorrie](https://x.com/bertiecorrie) and [@W\_Y\_X](https://x.com/W_Y_X)
projects.title: Rollup.wtf

projects.heading: Collection Analytics at Stargaze
projects.description: Data visualisation for Stargaze NFT Collection analytics. This project replaced a Metabase dashboard with an on-brand and integrated dashboard on Stargaze collection pages.
projects.title: Collection Analytics

projects.heading: Platform Analytics at Stargaze
projects.description: Data visualisation and data ingestion from Metabase to Prisma (PlanetScale) with Apollo GraphQL resolvers. This project replaced the Metabase dashboard with an on-brand and integrated dashboard on the Stargaze website.
projects.title: Platform Analytics

projects.heading: Freelance Front-end Developer at Pillar
projects.description: Built out the Pillar landing page for a rebrand and cleanup of the website. Improved user experience of the Pillar Wallet Web Recovery Portal.
projects.title: Freelance Front-end Developer

projects.heading: Freelance Front-end Developer at Hummingbot
projects.description: Worked on the design system, marketing website, and improved documentation for the Miner platform, as well as the rewards program.
projects.title: Freelance Front-end Developer

sideProjects.heading: Website Refresh at Voices Radio
sideProjects.description:
A community radio station based in London.

Worked with https://www.studiopanorama.de and team to design and build out their website refresh.
sideProjects.title: Website Refresh

sideProjects.heading: Website Consulting at Oroko Radio
sideProjects.description:
Oroko is a not-for-profit independent internet radio station based in Accra, Ghana.

Worked with the team to pick their tech stack and helped provide the basis of the radio station's website and CMS.

Design by https://www.studiopanorama.de
sideProjects.title: Website Consulting

sideProjects.heading: Soapbox
sideProjects.description:
Soapbox was a social audio platform focused on hanging out with your friends and playing games together.

Co-founded with https://twitter.com/DeanEigenmann.

Platform was shutdown December of 2021.
sideProjects.title: Soapbox

sideProjects.heading: Website at Refuge Worldwide
sideProjects.description:
A community radio station and fundraising platform based in Berlin.

Worked with https://www.studiopanorama.de and the Refuge Worldwide team to design and build out the station's website and broadcast platform.
sideProjects.title: Website

workExperience.heading: Product Engineer (Software Engineer) at Conduit
workExperience.description: Conduit dashboard development, implementation of product analytics. Worked with [Moniker](https://monikersf.com) and team on the Conduit rebrand.
workExperience.title: Product Engineer (Software Engineer)

workExperience.heading: Front-end Developer at Capsule
workExperience.description:
Worked with the Capsule team building out the https://www.pills.game project, and Endomo cozy-game prototype using MUD on-chain game engine.\
\
Created a cell based Avatar creation engine for the PILLS.game project.
workExperience.title: Front-end Developer

workExperience.heading: Front-end Developer at Dialectic
workExperience.description: Design and development of marketing website and editorial page. Web3 product development.
workExperience.title: Front-end Developer

workExperience.heading: Front-end Developer at Union
workExperience.description: Built out the original Union Finance beta application on the Kovan Ethereum testnet, laid the groundwork for the new Union app experience on mainnet Ethereum. https://union.finance
workExperience.title: Front-end Developer

workExperience.heading: Front-end Developer at Async Art
workExperience.description:
Built out the original Async Art web app and marketing website, built out the dApp to handle the launch of Async Music as well as Art NFTs.

Laid the groundwork for the Async Canvas creator tools and the set up the tech stack for future Async Art apps.
workExperience.title: Front-end Developer

workExperience.heading: Co-Founder at Coal
workExperience.description:
Coal was a platform to help tattoo artists find guest spots in cities where their fans are. Tattoo artists had their own page they would link to from their Instagram and their fans could request them to their city from there. We would then help place the artist in our partner studios all over the world.

The platform was shutdown in mid 2020.
workExperience.title: Co-Founder

workExperience.heading: Front-end Developer at Centrifuge
workExperience.description: Development of the Marketing website in Gatsby Framework and implementation of a CMS. Aided in the creation of the Design System used in the Centrifuge dashboard.
workExperience.title: Front-end Developer

workExperience.heading: Co-Founder at Deep Work Studio
workExperience.description: Helped co-found Deep Work Studio, running the development efforts of the agency. Implementing design systems and developing applications for our clients.
workExperience.title: Co-Founder

workExperience.heading: Web Developer at Contentful
workExperience.description: Development of the marketing website in Middleman SSG framework. Built the foundation for the migration to Gatsby Framework. Created native integrations between Contentful CMS and other marketing tools to improve developer speed.
workExperience.title: Web Developer

workExperience.heading: Marketing Specialist at Onshape
workExperience.description: Design and development on Onshape marketing website as well as other Onshape web entities. Video production and script writing for the official YouTube channel as well as 3D printing content for community development.
workExperience.title: Marketing Specialist

education.heading: Interactive Media Design spec. Computer Game Design & Programming at Becker College
education.degree: Interactive Media Design spec. Computer Game Design & Programming
